EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize TRAX Testing with Tosca - EMEA - 2014.11.11.Email - Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Webinar: Optimize TRAX Testing with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Less Cost, Less Effort and Faster Time to Market
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our webinar “Optimize TRAX Testing with Tosca”. Trax Software Quality Assurance Specialist, Anothony Frucci and Tricentis’ very own Director of Delivery, Matthias Rapp, talked about how to optimize your QA/Test environment in order to save money and to go into production faster. Questions from the audience made the discussion lively.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>. Best regards, The TRAX and Tricentis Webinar Team
Anthony Frucci Software Quality Assurance Specialist TRAX
Matthias Rapp Director Delivery Tricentis
